casebody.data:
TOWNSEND v. HUDSON et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. January 6, 1903.) No. 1,191. In Error to the Circuit Court of the United States for the Northern District of Texas. W. M. Walton and James H. Robertson, for plaintiff in error. M. B. Templeton, for defendants in error.

Before PARDEE and SHEDBY, Circuit Judges, and BOARMAN, District Judge. .

PER CURIAM.

We are all of opinion that the judgment of the circuit court is right, and it is therefore affirmed.
